name: airframe

the body of an aircraft: The military bought engines and airframes separately, then did the final assembly.
More examplesFewer examplesDuring the first few minutes of climb is when the airframe and engines are under maximum load.The company's greatest technological achievement lies in the computerized production technology behind the airframes. It's the same airframe, but the avionics are better.The cockpit voice recording picked up an airframe rattle. GE, NASA and all the major airframe manufacturers are involved.
